title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, October 30, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Ezra Pound (1885). He coined the term “imagism” for poetry which sought clarity of expression through the use of precise images.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Ezra Pound (1885). He coined the term “imagism” for poetry which sought clarity of expression through the use of precise images.
